name: Smackball
description:
Smackball is a fast-paced, competitive sports game for two players, inspired by sports like tennis, squash and air-hockey. The rules are simple: smack the ball across half court before your timer runs out, and try to score a goal against your opponent!

Features:

  • Play locally, against your friends or the AI.
  • 5 different game modes.
  • 8 color palettes to personalize the look of the game.
  • Customize the gameplay and create your own game modes.

Note:

You’ll need at least one controller for local multiplayer matches.
